description: An RDF vocabulary for relating SW vocabulary terms to their status.
label: SemWeb Vocab Status ontology

moreinfo.description: more information about the status etc of a term, typically human oriented
moreinfo.label: more info

term_status.description: the status of a vocabulary term, expressed as a short symbolic string; known values include 'unstable','testing', 'stable' and 'archaic'
term_status.label: term status

userdocs.description: human-oriented documentation, examples etc for use of this term
userdocs.label: user docs
